text: The 2007 4 Nations Cup was held in Leksand, Sweden from November 7 to November 11, 2007.http://www.hockeycanada.ca/. All games were played at the Ejendals Arena. The teams involved were Canada, the United States, Sweden, and Finland. {|cellpadding="3" cellspacing="1" style="font-size: 95%; text-align: left;" width="100%" |- |width="33%"| ;November 7 *Canada 4 - 1 Finland *Sweden 0 - 4 USA |width="33%"| ;November 8 *Canada 6 - 3 USA *Sweden 0 - 3 Finland |width="33%"| ;November 10 *Finland 1 - 2 USA *Sweden 3 - 5 Canada |- |colspan="3"| ;November 11 *game for the 3rd place: Finland 1 - 0 Sweden *game for the first place : USA 0 - 2 Canada |} Canada defeated the USA 2-0 in the gold medal game. *Gold - Canada *Silver - USA *Bronze - Finland *Fourth - Sweden ==References== ==See also== * 4 Nations Cup 2007–08 Category:2007–08 in Finnish ice hockey Category:2007–08 in Swedish ice hockey Category:2007–08 in Canadian women's ice hockey Category:2007–08 in American women's ice hockey 2007–08 Category:2007–08 in women's ice hockey
title: 2007 4 Nations Cup
